original_text: It is God himself who helps us to be patient and strong. So I pray that he will help you to agree with each other and to be friends. That is how Christ Jesus wants you to live.
korean_text: 이제 인내와 위로의 하나님이 너희로 그리스도 예수를 본받아 서로 뜻이 같게 하여 주사

sentences.original_text: It is God himself who helps us
So I pray that he will help you
That is how Christ Jesus wants you to live
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 그리스도 예수께서 여러분이 살기를 원하시는 방식입니다
